data.message: Hye ..just want to ask..can i change my page name..my page is over 200 likes..of can how to do and what the procedure?

replies.message: Hey Mat. If 200 or more people like your Page, you must be an admin to submit a request to change your Page's name. If your request is approved, you won't be able to change your Page's name again. You can only change your Page's name once. Please visit our Help Center to learn how to submit a request: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806 Thanks! -Hailey
